page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content:
There are two local{newspapers}which serve the area, The Beds And Bucks Observer with a circulation of 20000 and the Herald with 114,000.
The Observer costs 14p and is published weekly. The Herald is one of the weekly (free) sheeets which came onto the newspaper scene in the early 1980's. Paid for by the advertising they sell, the newspapers vary from good to bad in editorial content.
Two{local radio} stations serve the area -Independent radio Chiltern, paid for by advertising and the BBC's 31st local radio station BBC Radio Bedford.
{Telvision}coverage is varied with local viewers opting to take TV programmes from London, East Anglia or Midlands transmitters of BBC or IBA
